p: Finally, 82 papers were selected for further data extraction. Studies were sorted by year of publication in order to visualize the evolution of research in this field over the years ( Figure 2). The first report dated from 1989 and was by Saettone et al. [ 24], who studied the complexation of the diterpene forskolin with cyclodextrin for ocular administration. The number of publications has gradually grown over the years, indicating an increasing interest in the topic.
